attributes.action: Make breaks compulsory for catering staff working long hours
attributes.additional_details: Kitchen staff doesn't have time to use toilet during the service (opening hours) because there is not enough staff to cover the breaks
attributes.background: Make it legal requirement for catering staff to have regular breaks

rejection.details:
Workers are already entitled to rest breaks at work: https://www.gov.uk/rest-breaks-work

We can accept petitions calling for changes to rights to work breaks, but it would need to be clear how you wanted these to be changed.
